original_text: Why did the Lord choose you as the people who would give him pleasure? It was not because you were the largest nation on the earth. No, you were the smallest of all nations!
korean_text: 여호와께서 너희를 기뻐하시고 너희를 택하심은 너희가 다른 민족보다 수효가 많기 때문이 아니니라 너희는 오히려 모든 민족 중에 가장 적으니라

sentences.original_text: Why did the Lord choose you
as the people who would give him pleasure?
It was not because you were the largest nation
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 당신이 가장 큰 민족이었기 때문이 아닙니다
